meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jay Giller Nanette Wargo Michael Cabana Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4001.

td.p: Jay Giller, a food buyer from East Brunswick, New Jersey
Nanette Wargo, a graduate student from Sauk Village, Illinois
Michael Cabana, a pediatrician from Ann Arbor, Michigan (whose 1-day cash winnings total $13,800)

tr.td: MEDICAL CENTER
THE MUSICAL FABRIC STORE
HERBS & SPICES
THE PLANETS
GO WITH THE FLOW
COMPLETES THE PROVERB

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Used in surgery, this instrument whose name is from the Latin for "small cutting tool" can have a ruby edge')
